dropStep.title: Seamless Process
dropStep.description: From data verification, booking, payment, to check-in and many more; everything is integrated in one simple application.

dropStep.title: IoT Digital Room Control
dropStep.description: Personalize your room with our high-tech features: mood lamp, QR door lock, and more through our B-Pad and your phone!

dropStep.title: Safe & Clean Stay
dropStep.description: Two words that best describe us: great hygiene. Rest assured, your comfort and safety are our top priorities.

dropStep.title: 24-hour Host Support
dropStep.description: Our hosts are always one call away. Simply leave a chat through the DM in our application and let them know what you need.
